title: Student leader to PCC chief, Cong loses big NE face in Ripun Bora - The Indian Express
content:
1. Student leader to PCC chief, Cong loses big NE face in Ripun Bora  The Indian Express
  2. Assam Congress Chief Makes Huge Admission, Says More Could Follow Ripun Bora Out Of Party  Republic World
  3. On Ex Assam Congress Chief's Resignation Letter, Himanta Sarma's Stinger  NDTV
  4. TMC gets a leg-up in Assam with top leader in camp, but long climb ahead  The Indian Express
  5. Mamata most suited to lead 2024 Oppn front, says Ripun Bora who quit Congress  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A state chief for six years till 2021, 65-year-old Bora first came to the Congress as a student leader, while at Gauhati University. He then worked as a bureaucrat in the state government for about a decade before joining politics full-time.
